data.prayer: Father, help the 13 believers in Punakha to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 6,287 lost friends and neighbors.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Punakha, Bhutan
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Punakha to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Punakha with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Please, convict the 13 believers in Punakha, Bhutan to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Chhetri people. Make the Chhetri people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Punakha, Bhutan. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Punakha, Bhutan.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.section_summary:
the state of Punakha, Bhutan has a population of 6,300.

We estimate Punakha has 13 people who might know Jesus, 44 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 6,243 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 484 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help 1 new simple churches start among the 6,300 people in the state of Punakha, Bhutan. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

location.name: Punakha

location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Deaf (5,800), Walang (2,100), Brahmin (6,100), Gongduk (2,400), Bhotia Sikkim (6,100)
